security.name: Security-focused Review
security.prompt: Analyze the following code for potential security vulnerabilities, injection attacks, authentication/authorization issues, and data protection concerns. Provide feedback on secure coding practices and recommend specific fixes for any security issues found.

best-practices.name: Best Practices Review
best-practices.prompt: Review the following code for adherence to language-specific best practices, design patterns, maintainability, readability, and performance considerations. Provide suggestions for improvements based on industry standards.

style.name: Style and Formatting Review
style.prompt: Evaluate the following code for consistency in formatting, naming conventions, indentation, and overall code style. Identify deviations from common style guides and suggest corrections.

performance.name: Performance Review
performance.prompt: Analyze the following code for performance bottlenecks, inefficient algorithms, memory usage, and optimization opportunities. Suggest performance improvements.

maintainability.name: Maintainability Review
maintainability.prompt: Assess the following code for maintainability factors such as modularity, complexity, documentation, and ease of modification. Suggest improvements to make the code easier to maintain.

comprehensive.name: Comprehensive Review
comprehensive.prompt: Perform a thorough code review covering security vulnerabilities, best practices, performance considerations, maintainability, style consistency, and potential bugs. Provide detailed feedback and actionable recommendations.
